name: Gravity Pong (Atmo)
description:
The gravity is changing after a random time. You can see in which directions the paddles are pulled by the green indicator bar at the top or bottom.

Also the speed of the ball is slowly increasing over time.

You can play against your friends or an AI. (I know it is anoying but the AI is just responding after the ball hit the enemy paddle)

___________________________________________________________________

Controlls

Left Player:

W -> Jump Up

S -> Jump Down

Right Player:

Arrow Up -> Jump Up

Arrow Down ->  Jump Down

___________________________________________________________________
